resources.string: Ntxiv ib pav Daws hu caw ntawm…
Thaub qab yog xiam oob qhab. Koj puas xav mus kho backup chaw thiab kom qhov no ceeb toom?
%s muaj ib tug ntau tsis ntev los ntaus los yog qhov tseem ceeb, yog koj paub tseeb tias koj xav siv qhov no laus ib?
Cov ntaub ntawv npe %s twb tshwm sim. Overwrite?
Tsis muaj ib tug Google Account koj yuav tsuas muaj peev xwm xa, tsis tau txais cov lus. Koj puas xav mus ntxiv ib Google account?
Peb xav tau koj kev pab txhim kho SafeSlinger. Koj puas xav cia xa tej yam uas tsis rau peb?
Tag nrho cov neeg yuav tsum txawj tej yam ntxiv, ib txhia siv laus tseem ceeb tawm tswv yim.
Suab neeg uas ua ntawv Txiav suab ntawm cov kev ua yuam kev.
Yuav tsis ua si rau cov ntaubntawv povthawj.
Microphone tso cai yuav tsum tau sau ib tug ruaj ntseg suab lus. Coj mus rhaub %s khawm SafeSlinger Microphone tso cai kom paub meej.
Ntaus ntawv tsis txhawb backup restore.
Vim muaj ib tug kab laum nyob hauv Android 4.1, koj yuav tau uninstall thiab reinstall SafeSlinger.
Ib tug Google account yog yuav tsum tau. Thov qhib lub account saib xyuas thiab ntxiv ib Google account.
Sau npe tsis authenticated, thov retry manually tom qab.
Sau npe yog tsis muaj nyob rau qhov version, thov mus saib rau ib tug tshiab version.
Tsis yog ntaus ntawv sau npe nrog Google. Ntaus ntawv no tsis tam sim no txhawb laub messaging.
Laub sau npe muab kev pab tsis muaj, teem nyob rau hauv retry %d vib nas this.
Ntau daim ntaub ntawv sau npe rau laub. Thov uninstall ib co lwm yam kev siv thiab retry.
Xa tsis tau ib qho kev npliag Symptoms.
Xa tsis tau attachments tshaj %d bytes nyob rau hauv loj.
Xa tsis tau ib tug tsis raug cai Symptoms.
Hu creation ua tsis tau tejyam.
Hu insert ua tsis tau tejyam.
Qhov no hu uas ploj lawm ib lub npe, thov koj kho kom raug.
Qhov no hu uas ploj lawm ib lub npe, thov reselect.
Yuav tsis extract private tseem ceeb.
%1$s yog tsis txaus siab rau %2$s lub sij hawm no.
Cov ntaub ntawv cia yog tsis muaj.
Ib tug siv tau hu lub npe yog yuav tsum tau.
Lub phooj ywg tseem ceeb hom ntawv yog invalid.
Kos npe pov thawj ua tsis tau tejyam.
Passphrases yuav tsum tau yam tsawg %d cim.
SafeSlinger tsis ntes NDK them nyiaj yug nyob no ntaus ntawv, uas yog yuav tsum tau.
Koj sim xa ntau yam khoom. Lub sij hawm no, SafeSlinger tsuas txhawb xa ib yam khoom ntawm ib lub sij hawm.
Koj tau zoo tshaj cov lus quota rau cov uas tau txais kev pabcuam. Thov retry tom qab.
Uas tau txais kev pabcuam muaj ib tug uas ploj lawm los yog phem laub sau npe. Koj yuav tsum tsis txhob xa lus rau qhov no ntaus ntawv.
Cov lus yog ib yam nkaus thiab loj. Txo qhov luaj li cas ntawm cov lus.
Uas tau txais kev pabcuam laub sau npe yog tsis siv tau. Tus neeg tej zaum yuav muaj uninstalled SafeSlinger los yog muab tua cov ntawv qhia. Koj yuav tsum tsis txhob xa lus rau qhov no ntaus ntawv.
Muaj ib tug yuam kev sib txuas lus nrog rau cov laub ceeb toom cov kev pab cuam.
Koj tau zoo tshaj cov lus quota no ntaus ntawv. Thov retry tom qab.
Ceeb toom cov kev pab cuam yog tsis muaj lub sij hawm no. Thov koj sim xa cov lus tom qab.
Yuav tsis npaj lub suab recorder.
Pib, pav Daws nrog lwm tus neeg siv nyob rau tib lub sij hawm.
Koj xav tau ib tug txuas los yog ib tug ntawv xov xa.
Yuav tsis tshem tawm cov qhia cov ntaub ntawv.
Tsis tau phim pej xeem tseem ceeb rau private tseem ceeb nyob rau hauv crypto mob.
Tsis tau txuag rau cov lus database.
Tsis tau cawm tau rau tus neeg tau database.
Tsis tau hloov cov lus database.
Tsis tau hloov tus neeg database.
SafeSlinger yuam kev, thov pib dua.
Hu cov ntaub ntawv twb formatted incorrectly.
Siv tshuaj ntsuam no teem caij rau koj lub npe mus pauv nrog rau lwm tus neeg, thiab ib tug passphrase los tiv thaiv koj cov ntaub ntawv. Coj mus rhaub Ua khawm thaum tiav lawm.
Mus pauv yog leejtwg cov ntaub ntawv, xyuas kom meej tag nrho cov neeg yog nyob ze los yog nyob rau hauv lub xov tooj. Lub Pib Txauv khawm yuav pauv tsuas yog tus soj ntsuam hu cov ntaub ntawv.

Tej zaum koj yuav hloov tus kheej cov ntaub ntawv hais txog koj tus kheej nyob rau hauv no screen los tapping rau ntawm lub pob nrog koj lub npe. Qhov no yuav tso ib cov zaub mov uas koj mus Kho kom raug koj sib cuag, Tsim Tshiab sib cuag, los yog Siv Lwm hu.
Tshuaj ntsuam no qhia txog tag nrho yav tag los lus, thiab attachments uas tseem muaj rau download.

Siv tshuaj ntsuam no rau ID nkag mus rau hauv daim ntawv thov nrog koj passphrase. Yog hais tias koj tau tsis nco qab lawm koj passphrase, tej zaum koj yuav tsim ib tug tshiab tseem ceeb tiv thaiv los ntawm ib tug tshiab passphrase los ntawm tapping lub nco qab passphrase? khawm. Coj mus rhaub siv cov npe hloov ntawm ntau yam yuam sij.
Siv tshuaj ntsuam no yuav hloov koj passphrase los ntawm nkag mus rau koj lub xeem passphrase rau kev pom zoo thiab tus tshiab passphrase.
Tiv tauj nrog SafeSlinger yuam sij tso tawm no, xaiv ib tug xa koj zaj xov mus.
Thaum tiav lawm, tus raws tu qauv yuav qhia ib daim ntawv teev tus neeg cov ntaub ntawv exchanged. Xaiv lub cov neeg koj xav kom txuag tau thiab nias Import.
Tshuaj ntsuam no tso cai rau koj mus xaiv ob tug neeg koj tau slung yuam sij nrog ua ntej rau securely xa lawv yuam sij rau txhua lwm yam. Tsuas nias paub thaum npaj txhij.
Tshuaj ntsuam no tso cai rau koj mus xaiv ib co ntaub ntawv thiab ib tug neeg xa mus rau. Tsuas nias Xa thaum npaj txhij.
Tshuaj ntsuam no tso cai rau koj yuav hloov lub neej ntawd chaw rau hauv daim ntawv thov.
Lub koob yees duab kev tso cai yuav tsum tau muab snapshots luag lus. Coj mus rhaub %s khawm SafeSlinger koob yees duab kev tso cai kom paub meej.
Hu tso cai no yuav tsum tau rau securely sib koom hu phaib. Coj mus rhaub %s khawm SafeSlinger Contacts tso cai kom paub meej.
Laub sau npe yog uas ploj lawm.
Ceeb toom tso cai rau tog twg los alerts los yog banners, thiab daim xov tooj, yuav tsum rau kev ruaj ntseg messaging. Coj mus rhaub %s khawm SafeSlinger ceeb toom tso cai kom paub meej.
SafeSlinger yog tsis optimized rau iOS 5.x kiag li lawm. SafeSlinger yuav tsum tau iOS no 6 los yog siab dua.
Yees duab lub tsev qiv ntawv tso cai yuav tsum tau muab cov duab rau luag cov lus. Coj mus rhaub %s khawm SafeSlinger Photo Library tso cai kom paub meej.
Koj yuav xaiv koj hu rau card xa koj cov phooj ywg thiab SafeSlinger yuav encrypt rau koj. Los pab kom qhov no feature, koj yuav tsum tau cia SafeSlinger nkag tau mus rau koj mob thaum nug.
Koj yuav sau ib lub suab lus xa koj cov phooj ywg thiab SafeSlinger yuav encrypt rau koj. Los pab kom qhov no feature, koj yuav tsum tau cia SafeSlinger nkag tau mus rau koj lub Microphone thaum nug.

SafeSlinger yog ib qho encrypted messaging daim ntawv thov thiab yuav tsis ua yam uas tsis tau tso cai rau cov khoom lus los ntawm ntawv qhia. Kom tuaj lus, koj yuav tsum tau cia SafeSlinger xa koj qhia thaum nug.
Koj tseem ceeb tau hloov: pav Daws dua.
Pib messaging, pav Daws nrog no neeg siv nyob rau tib lub sij hawm.
Ntsiab hom deprecated: pav Daws dua.
Sau koj lub npe thiab ib tug passphrase los tiv thaiv koj cov ntaub ntawv:
Kais koj lub npe mus ntxiv los yog tshem tawm hu cov ntaub ntawv, xyuas khoom koj xav qhia, thiab siv Pib Txauv thaum lwm tus neeg yog npaj txhij mus pauv:
SafeSlinger iCloud yog enabled. Coj mus rhaub Ua khawm thaum tiav lawm.
Tsis muaj lus. Tej zaum koj yuav xa ib cov lus los ntawm cov ntseg tab.
Ntxiv tau txais, koj yuav tsum thawj pav Daws nrog ib tug los yog ntau tshaj lwm cov neeg nyob rau tib lub sij hawm. Tej zaum koj yuav xa ib tug pav Daws hu caw los ntawm cov ntawv qhia zaub mov.
Tsis muaj leej twg ntawm koj tam sim no tau txais phim koj nrhiav cov lus nug. Thov koj sim ib tug txawv query los yog caw ib tug tshiab hu.
Tsis muaj qhia cov ntaub ntawv. Txuas koj ntaus ntawv nrog iTunes thiab luag cov ntaub ntawv mus rau lub qhia nplaub tshev.
Tos ib tug neeg xa lus mus rau:
De ib cov ntaub ntawv rau muab:

Mus teeb ib tug ruaj ntseg messaging kev twb kev txuas, peb yuav tau raws li los yog xov tooj txhua lwm yam nyob rau tib lub sij hawm, thiab ces pav Daws cia li ib zaug kom paub tseeb kev twb kev txuas.
Peb yuav pib ruaj ntseg messaging nrog lub qhib qhov SafeSlinger iPhone los yog hauv xov tooj ntawd app?
Feem ntau cov tsis ntev los no xwb
Kuv tshiab SafeSlinger ntawv yog txuas.
Xyuas hu koj xav kom hloov nyob rau hauv koj qhov chaw nyob hauv phau ntawv, ces siv Import txuag ruaj ntseg hu:
Xa cov ntaub ntawv yuam kev
Qhia no hint tom ntej no lub sij hawm.
Siv kev hais lus paub yog xiam oob qhab vim hais tias nws yuav ua ib qho ntaub ntawv los
Cia li download tau lus attachments thaum in thiaj li tso rau hauv.
Cia li decrypt lus thaum in thiaj li tso rau hauv.
Txais kev ceeb toom thaum backup yog offline.
Qhia ib tug tutorial ua ntej sim pav Daws.
Kais mus download tau cov ntaub ntawv
Kais resume lus cua ntsawj ntshab
Kais thiab tuav xa daim ntawv pov thawj hloov tshiab.
Tej zaum koj yuav optionally pab kom SafeSlinger iCloud backup nyob rau hauv iOS chaw. Coj mus rhaub Ua khawm thaum tiav lawm.
Kov rau configure cache timeout chaw.

Los tiv thaiv koj cov ntaub ntawv, SafeSlinger tsis cia koj nyob qhov twg passphrase rau rov qab. Tej zaum koj yuav tsuas nkag tau txais thiab cov lus tsim nyob rau hauv tib lub passphrase ID nkag mus. Txawm li cas los, tej zaum koj yuav tsim ib tug tshiab qhov tseem ceeb thiab passphrase, ces rov pav Daws nrog koj tau txais.
Cov nram qab no yuam sij yuav muab deleted:
Muaj tsis muaj ntau tsis ntev los no yuam sij tshaj koj li.
Tsuas yuam sij generated ntau tsis ntev los koj li, generated rau %s, tej zaum yuav tshem.
Tsis pub twg paub Txoj cai
generating tseem ceeb, qhov no yuav siv sij hawm ib tug thaum lub sij hawm…
tau txais cov ntaub ntawv encrypted…
muab kho dua chaw nyob phau ntawv…
muab kho dua tseem ceeb database…
Lus rua li cua ntsawj ntshab.
Ntawv theej rau ntawv los teev cia.

SafeSlinger no yog tsim los yooj yim qhia yog leejtwg cov ntaub ntawv, nyob rau hauv tus neeg los yog hauv xov tooj, authenticated, private, thiab lawm. Txhua tus neeg uas koj qhia rau tsim ib tug ruaj ntseg kawg-rau-kawg channel xa lus.
Yooj yim pauv sib cuag nrog lwm tus neeg
Securely pav phau ntawv, duab, dab tsi!
Muaj zog tiv thaiv koj cov ntaub ntawv cryptography
SafeSlinger: Hais 3 lo lus thiab mus ib txhis sib tham nyob rau hauv kev thaj yeeb.
Yuav tsum tau ntsia ib tug tsawg kawg nkaus ntawm 2 kiag li lawm.
Ib tug Internet kev twb kev txuas yuav tsum nquag plias.
Yees duab lub tsev qiv ntawv
Tau txais kev pabcuam Nthuav dav
Txuag cov ntaub ntawv Raws li
